    .. note::

.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-example-title

.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_testing_plot_1_weakspot_reg.py:


WeakSpot: Regression
=====================================

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 8-9

Experiment initialization and data preparation

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 9-17

.. code-block:: default

    from piml import Experiment
    from piml.models import XGB2Regressor

    exp=Experiment()
    exp.data_loader(data="BikeSharing", silent=True)
    exp.data_summary(feature_exclude=["yr", "mnth", "temp"], silent=True)
    exp.data_prepare(target="cnt", task_type="regression", silent=True)








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 18-19

Train Model

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 19-20

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_train(model=XGB2Regressor(), name="XGB2")







.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 21-22

Histogram-based weakspot for a single feature

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 22-26

.. code-block:: default

    results = exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="weakspot", slice_method="histogram", 
                               slice_features=["hr"], threshold=1.1, min_samples=100,
                               original_scale=True, return_data=True, figsize=(5, 4))
    results.data

   :alt: Weak Regions
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing/images/sphx_glr_plot_1_weakspot_reg_001.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 27-28

Histogram-based weakspot for two features

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 28-33

.. code-block:: default

    results = exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="weakspot", slice_method="histogram", 
                               slice_features=["hr", "workingday"], threshold=1.1, min_samples=100,
                               original_scale=True, return_data=True, figsize=(5, 4))
    results.data

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 34-35

Histogram-based weakspot for a single feature on test set

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 35-39

.. code-block:: default

    results = exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="weakspot", slice_method="histogram", 
                               slice_features=["hr"], threshold=1.1, min_samples=100,
                               use_test=True, original_scale=True, return_data=True, figsize=(5, 4))
    results.data

   :class: sphx-glr-single-img

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 40-41

Histogram-based weakspot for a single feature using MAE metric

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 41-46

.. code-block:: default

    results = exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="weakspot", slice_method="histogram", 
                               slice_features=["hr"], threshold=1.1, min_samples=100,
                               metric="MAE", original_scale=True, return_data=True, figsize=(5, 4))
    results.data

   :alt: Weak Regions

   :class: sphx-glr-single-img

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 47-48

Tree-based weakspot for a single feature using MAE metric

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 48-53

.. code-block:: default

    results = exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="weakspot", slice_method="tree", 
                               slice_features=["hr"], threshold=1.1, min_samples=100,
                               metric="MAE", original_scale=True, return_data=True, figsize=(5, 4))
    results.data

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 54-55

XGB-based weakspot for a single feature using MAE metric

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 55-58

.. code-block:: default

    results = exp.model_diagnose(model="XGB2", show="weakspot", slice_method="xgb", 
                                 slice_features=["atemp"], threshold=1.1, min_samples=60, use_test=True, 
                                 metric="MAE", original_scale=True, return_data=True, figsize=(5, 4))
    results.data

   :class: sphx-glr-single-img
